original_body_lines: The 12th edition of Sri Lanka's National Healthcare Expo, Medicare 2023, was inaugurated today at the Sirimavo Bandaranaike Memorial Exhibition Centre at the BMICH amidst the participation of a host of high-profile invitees, healthcare professionals, industry stakeholders, and the general public. The exhibition will be held over three days until next Wednesday (5). Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
